fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Force a deal between you and a target at night. You pay them one of your attributes for one of their abilities. If they have no abilities, they become doused.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune.
- Conversion immune.
- The first time you're attacked, you will protect yourself with powerful defense.
- You can use multiple abilities each night.
- If there are no Underworld Offensive alive, and the Apocalypse is dead, you will become the Apocalypse. (yes you can sell this)
